title: Siren Evelynn Concept
body: I came up with this not too long ago and really wanted to draw it out. It's more of a rough concept rn but I really like how it turned out! Tell me what you think!

replies.body: Oh this is a neat idea for a skin line! And its always awesome to see VFX concepts, really helps picture the entire package. Thank you for sharing, looks awesome :D!
This is already a skin line isn't it? =) Siren Cass exists!
Oh!! You are totally right, my mistake

I like that.

I would suggest though a less reptile scaly and more of a multicolored one with some floating fins on the hips and the feet to give more of the Siren vibe :3
I love that she has an Angler face in her camouflage form, it's horrifyingly cool!

There we go, a perfect skin for Eve. Something actually different, something that fits and is a whole new schematic.
+1

I like it a lot, but I'm not sure how I feel about the shells on her tentacle... claw... hand... things. Yeah. Those're words.
Maybe to replace the shadows, and to reduce the skin by a little bit (because right now it looks kinda awkward with just the shells there) there could be similar effects to her shadows, but with water? Just an idea pitch.
I love the shell nails, as well as the way you used the shell on her heel to create a high-heel-shoe look.
The fact that her passive turns her into an angler fish theme is wonderful, and fits her character amazingly well.
On the list of things I want in the game, this is on it.
I was memeing about a deep sea Evelynn some time ago (Ursula from the little Mermaid), but i still think that a water-themed eve would be a neat idea
As someone who loves anything to do with Mythology, I NEED it.

Perhaps color her skin away from the tan that all her skins have now

I'd love to see a blue or purple tinged eve as a skin, and this one looks amazing!
GJ man.
